name: juyeok-gui-mobile
description: 주역 GUI 모바일 배포용 Capacitor 프로젝트

scripts.verify:release: npm run i18n:check && npm run license:audit && npm run build:web
scripts.cap:sync:android: npm run build:web && npx cap sync android
scripts.cap:sync:ios: npm run build:web && npx cap sync ios
scripts.cap:sync: npm run build:web && npx cap sync
scripts.android: npm run build:web && npx cap sync android && npx cap open android
scripts.ios: npm run build:web && npx cap sync ios && npx cap open ios
